content: flap join instep stitches and continuing with the chart pattern for instep stitches only pu and knit into the 16 purl bumps along other side of the heel flap knit to marker one round is complete now continue decreasing every other round as follows round 1 k to last 3 stitches on round 2 k one round even instep needle b k2tog k1 k instep in is in pattern pattern k1 ssk on needle b k to end of the round continue decrease rounds until you have 64 stitches knit foot until 1 75 less than desired foot length rounded toe *k6 k2tog* repeat to end of *k2 k2tog* repeat to end of round k6 row round k2 row *k5 k2tog* repeat to end of *k1 k2tog* repeat to end of round k5 row round k1 row *k4 k2tog* repeat to end of *k2tog* repeat to end of round round k4 row *k3 k2tog* repeat to end of round k3 row there 8 stitches left cut yarn and gather the stitches together to close the opening weave in all your ends block as desired abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together sl slip p2tog purl 2 stitches together rs right side ssk slip slip knit ws wrong side p purl pm place stitch marker k knit co cast on p purl pu pick up pattern & photography by olivia villarreal for personal use only pattern support email olive villarreal@yahoo com
